Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory186.png'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'This should be good.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You meet Echo by the park's artificial lake, where Echo straightens her rain boots before cautiously stepping onto a small wooden boat."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Now it's your turn, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Jump onto the boat)', 3: '10', 4: '(Board the boat with caution)', 5: '17'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiRainNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "The boat lurches, and Echo's expression flashes with panic. She scrambles to steady the rocking vessel."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiRainNew.prefab'}
{3: "You've been as cautious as you can, but you notice Echo is still gripping the edge of the boat tightly."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory186.png'}
{3: "It's evening when you receive Echo's message and make your way to the lakeside."}
{3: "Even though it's already late, on a day like today—this festival has only just begun."}
{3: 'Small, scattered boats glide across the lake.'}
{3: 'Echo is here, waiting patiently. From a distance, she seems to be writing in a small notebook.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Echo', 3: 'Commandant! Over here!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lifts her gaze and locks eyes with you. The tension on her face fades in an instant.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Good evening, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Long time no see.', 3: '36'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Long time no see.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She turns around to look at the boat behind her.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Even though it's not my first time attending an event like this, I'm still picking up plenty of new knowledge and local customs today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "But... this time, I've found something I really want to do with you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Maybe it fits the Double Seventh Festival theme better... spending time with someone who matters?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo explains this with a solemn air.'}
{2: 'Are we going rowing?', 3: '44'}
{3: 'Echo nods and, looking a little shy, starts to speak.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I may know the basics of rowing, but I'm still a long way from mastering it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Plus, the instructions in the survival manual aren't exactly clear, so I'd like to learn from you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You take hold of the oar, and the armor—absent a moment ago—shows up and gently nudges the boat away from the shore, easing Echo's earlier nervousness."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Echo', 3: "Good. That's the first step... then...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo hunches over her notebook, writing and sketching at lightning speed.'}
{3: 'You slow your motions as much as you can, breaking down every paddle stroke into careful, deliberate steps.'}
{3: 'You look Echo in the eye, noticing the spark of curiosity gleaming there.'}
{2: 'Echo, want to try it out?', 3: '62'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Huh? Right now?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Echo's hand automatically tightens around the edge of the boat again."}
{2: 'Naturally, getting each movement right really matters.', 3: '66'}
{2: "But it's best to experience it firsthand.", 3: '67'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Experience it firsthand...', 4: '1'}
{2: '...No need to jot that down.', 3: '69'}
{3: "At last, the young Construct musters the courage to grab an oar from the boat's hold."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I'll give it my all!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo, eyes fixed with determination, quietly repeats the notes she just recorded and dips the oar into the water, while you help her keep the boat steady.'}
{3: "The boat drifts forward under her careful strokes. It's obvious she hasn't quite found the right rhythm yet, so the progress stays slow and steady."}
{2: "You've got real talent, Echo.", 3: '76'}
{3: "Echo can't help letting out a quick gasp of joy, then immediately pulls herself together."}
{3: "Somehow, the small boat has already reached the center of the lake. It's not a full-moon night, but the stars glow brightly, making it feel like you're sailing through a cosmic sea."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "These stars... they're so beautiful...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'This feeling... Please hold on a second!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo takes a finely crafted notebook out of her pocket and sets it on her lap. She flips to a blank page and starts scribbling furiously.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "It's just a sudden rush of inspiration... I haven't polished it yet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Still, a first impression is always the most important, right?', 3: '88'}
{3: "Echo doesn't recite her poem right away like she used to. Instead, she hands the notebook over to you."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "P-please... don't make it too loud...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg'}
{1: "This night isn't the moon's birthday,", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Like what we imagined.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: "We're stumbling as we go,", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I hope you also pick up a bit of this dirt.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'We nurture the heart that grows from the soil.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'In reunion,', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'All we can do,', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Is give the sun its own light once more.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: "Or maybe shape a river from the moon's soft glow.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Return our feelings,', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: "In love's purest form...", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A sudden undercurrent rocks the small boat, snapping both of you out of your daydream.'}
{3: 'Water sprays in all directions as the Construct girl instinctively topples right into your arms.'}
